full_summary: ### Canadian Government Tender Announcement **Tender ID and Reference Number** -------------------------------- EC095-230007 RMSO Coffee Zone 4 Reference Number: WS4220654570-Doc4444040956 **Request Type and Status** --------------------------- * Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer * Tender Status: Expiration Date Passed **Procurement Overview** ----------------------- This Request for Standing Offer is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) under the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**. The solicitation number is WS4220654570, and the amendment number is 1. **Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity** --------------------------------------------- * Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Regions of Opportunity: None **Goods and Services** -------------------- The procurement is for the supply and delivery of **coffee and tea products** (UNSPC 50201700) to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) across **Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick, and Canada**. **Contracting Entity Details** ----------------------------- * Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) * Contracting Entity Address: * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada * Contact Information: * Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC) * Email: tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca **Procurement Timeline** ------------------------- * Publication Date: 2024-03-12 * Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-08 (14:00:00) **Note** -------- Please refer to the official tender document available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064946?extsite=MTkwNjQ5NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064946?extsite=MTkwNjQ5NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for complete details and information regarding this procurement. Click here to view the official tender document. [1](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064946?extsite=MT
